main event: An object, possibly a balloon or aircraft, was spotted hovering over the Bay Bridge in Oakland, California on April 9, 1955.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of Planet Venus,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,The observer reported calling to the sky lights in the Oakland area,The investigation was authorized following the sighting, The card indicates multiple possibilities including balloon, aircraft, and astronomical objects.
sighted object: one object hovering over the Bay Bridge
